name: Hell On Earth (Klalayd)
description:
Description

Hell on Earth is a 2D Top-Down, roguelike, dungeon-crawler, survival horror where the main character will survive a world full of fiends and flesh eater creatures roaming on post-apocalyptic environment. Player needs to survive a series of waves, eliminate various creatures, and collect items to assist the player survives every wave.

Controls
  1. WASD - To move the player.
  2. Left-Click Button - Fire
  3. R - Reload
  4. E - Interact
Developers

Klyde Topino

Duane Rodriguez

Ivan Heramia
